extensionAttribute.description: This attribute checks for updates of Faronics Power Save. This attribute has been tested with Power Save 2.0.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh psUsername="EditFromTemplate_Power_Save_Service_Account_Username" psPassword="EditFromTemplate_Power_Save_Service_Account_Password" if [ -f "/Library/Application Support/Faronics/PowerSave/CLI" ]; then psUpdateCheck=`"/Library/Application Support/Faronics/PowerSave/CLI" "$psUsername" "$psPassword" checkForUpdates` fi echo "<result>$psUpdateCheck</result>"
